name: Slain Target
script:
if IsTargetted(matches[2]) and not table.contains(ak.burstfucks,matches[2]) then 
	 if ak.ai() then return end
   if IsTargetted(lockedminds) then lockedminds = nil end
   weaponattack = {}
   if isActive("Confirmed Hit Limbs", "trigger") > 0 then
      ak.limbs.parseBreaks()
   end
   ak.oresetparse()
   ak.defs.sileris = false
   ak.defs.speed = false
   affstrack.score.deaf = 100
   affstrack.score.blind = 100
   ak.scoreup(matches[2])
end
ak.limbs.limbreset(matches[2])
matches: ^Unable to withstand the arrow piercing [\w'\-]+ chest, ([\w'\-]+) stumbles to the ground, collapsing in a pool
^([\w'\-]+)\'s body disintegrates and a ghostly spirit rises from the ashes\. The ghost cries out in pain as a body forms around [\w'\-]+ that has .*\.$

^The last vestiges of strength having ebbed from ([\w'\-]+)\'s body\, [\w'\-]+ sinks to the floor with a sigh\.Suddenly\, your surroundings are enveloped in a blinding white light\, forcing you to cower with your hands over your eyes\. When you tentatively open them once more\, you are astonished to find ([\w'\-]+) alive once more\.$

^The last vestiges of strength having ebbed from ([\w'\-]+)\'s body\, (?:he|she) sinks to the floor with a sigh\. Suddenly\, your surroundings are enveloped in a blinding white light\, forcing you to cower with your hands over your eyes\. When you tentatively open them once more\, you are astonished to find [\w'\-]+ alive once more\.$
